troops.name: Fleshwalker
troops.description: A shambling humanoid just over six feet tall, its skeletal frame draped in peeling, rotting flesh. Sickly grey skin hangs in ragged strips, revealing sinew and bone. Sunken, milky eyes glint with an unholy hunger as it lurches forward, joints cracking like brittle twigs.

troops.name: Stalker
troops.description: A lanky predator standing nearly 6'5", moving with unnerving silence. Its mottled green-grey skin clings tight to sinewy limbs. A narrow face and high cheekbones frame wide, obsidian-like eyes that never blink. Fingers taper into needle-sharp talons, ready to strike from the shadows.

troops.name: Berserker
troops.description: A hulking mass of rippling muscle and scar tissue, the Base Berserker’s leathery brown skin is stretched taut over bruised flesh. Broken tusk-like teeth jut from its snarling maw, and every flex of its massive arms promises bone-crushing force.

troops.name: Mutant Engineer
troops.description: A twisted fusion of flesh and crude machinery: tubes and wires snake across its back, powering hydraulic limbs. A cracked metal helmet crowns its head, and one eye has been replaced by a dull yellow lens flickering with malfunctioning circuits.

troops.name: Acid Spitter
troops.description: A squat, hunched figure with rubbery, blistered skin. Glandular sacs pulse beneath the surface, glowing a sickly neon green. Its fleshy maw opens into a horn-like nozzle, drooling corrosive spit that hisses where it lands.

troops.name: Brute
troops.description: A living battering ram, the Brute is a mountain of muscle clad in leathery hide and calloused scales. Its broad shoulders bear the weight of a spiked club crudely forged from scrap metal. A low brow and deep-set red eyes glare out from a face hung with disdain.

troops.name: Alpha
troops.description: A towering colossus nearly eight feet tall, the Alpha’s pale, translucent skin stretches over thunderous muscles. Horn-like protrusions curl back from its skull, and intelligent, coal-black eyes flicker with predatory cunning. Its roar alone can crack stone.

troops.name: Fleshwalker
troops.description: More robust than its base counterpart, Superior Fleshwalkers sport thicker sinew and fewer hanging flesh strips. Fresh scars patch over old wounds, and elongated claws drip with dark ichor. A faint, unnatural glow pulses beneath their ashen skin.

troops.name: Stalker
troops.description: Lean and sinister, this Stalker’s slate-gray skin shimmers with bioluminescent veins. Eyes glow faintly, and membranous flaps along its arms ripple as it prowls. Its slender limbs end in serrated claws ready to slice through armor—and bone.

troops.name: Berserker
troops.description: Veins like thick ropes stand out over ebony-hued skin. Superior Berserkers sprout coarse dreadlocks matted with gore, and small horns curl from their temples. Every flex of their massive arms promises brutal devastation.

troops.name: Mutant Engineer
troops.description: Cybernetic implants pierce its flesh, and servo motors whirr beneath translucent skin. Its right arm has transformed into a multi-tool claw, sparks flying as it tinkers with makeshift weaponry. Steam hiss‐es from vents in its ribcage.

troops.name: Acid Spitter
troops.description: Superior Acid Spitters bear enlarged sacs that pulse with neon-green venom. Their skin is marred with corrosive blisters, and keratin spikes line their jaw—perfect for tearing flesh before the acidic spit does the rest.

troops.name: Brute
troops.description: An even bigger mountain of muscle, Superior Brutes sport bony ridges along their arms and obsidian-dark hide. Their fists, each the size of a wagon wheel, can shatter concrete with ease.

troops.name: Alpha
troops.description: Superior Alphas are behemoths draped in partial chitin plating. Horns twist into spires, and pulsing veins trace black patterns across pale flesh. Their roar carries ruthless authority—this is apex brutality incarnate.

troops.name: Fleshwalker
troops.description: Elite Fleshwalkers tower near seven feet, their ashen skin stretched tight over hypertrophic muscles. Black veins pulsate beneath the surface, and jagged bone spikes protrude from their shoulders. Their snarling face is half-skull, half-flesh.

troops.name: Stalker
troops.description: Nightmarish in form, Elite Stalkers bend at impossible angles, limbs swiveling like mechanical joints. Skin is a dark violet sheen, and a sweeping crest arcs from brow to nape. Their obsidian eyes burn with cunning malice.

troops.name: Berserker
troops.description: A true monstrosity, the Elite Berserker stands nearly eight feet tall with arms longer than most men’s legs. Bone plates fuse to its skin, and its jaw hinges unnaturally wide, dripping corrosive saliva as it howls in rage.

troops.name: Mutant Engineer
troops.description: Flesh and steel are inseparable here: exoskeletal plating juts from its limbs, and conduits pulse with electric charge. A rotating saw and welding torch sprout from its arms, ready to carve or repair with equal disregard.

troops.name: Acid Spitter
troops.description: Elite Acid Spitters carry dual venom sacs that glow a radioactive green. Thick, armored plates protect their torsos, and a mist of corrosive droplets shrouds them as they screech. Their scythe-like claws are stained with centuries of decay.

troops.name: Brute
troops.description: Encased in jagged bone-carapace plating, the Elite Brute is a living battering ram. Every stomp cracks the earth, and horn-like spikes along its arms make grabbing it a lethal mistake.

troops.name: Alpha
troops.description: A colossus of feral intelligence, the Elite Alpha is crowned by a bone crest and draped in moving ridges of flesh. Its coal-black eyes blaze like coals, and rows of spines run down its arms. Each step reverberates with absolute dominance.
